abstract: Death of 4-month-old Bronx boy Christopher Rhodes from blunt force injury to head with in his father's care is being ruled homicide; police have not released father's name.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Rhodes died from blunt force trauma to the head that his father said was the result of a fall from a child seat, the police said.

headline.main: Bronx Baby’s Death in August Ruled a Homicide, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Death of Baby Boy at Home in Bronx Is Ruled Homicide

snippet: Christopher Rhodes died from blunt force trauma to the head that his father said was the result of a fall from a child seat, the police said.

keywords.value: Office of the Chief Medical Examiner of the City of New York
